Once upon a time, there was a fluffy little cloud named Cumulina who was terrified of heights. While her friends danced joyfully above the mountains, Cumulina lingered low, afraid to float too high. One day, a gentle breeze named Zephyr encouraged her to rise, promising a breathtaking view. Hesitant but curious, Cumulina climbed higher. As she ascended, she saw the world belowâ€”a patchwork of fields, rivers, and tiny houses. Overwhelmed by the beauty, her fear melted away. Cumulina realized that sometimes, the best things lie just beyond our comfort zone. From that day on, she soared with her friends, embracing the heights.
